messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
회사별 검사데이터 건수를 알려줘, 그리고 건수가 가장 많은 순서로 출력해줘
select vndr_id,cc.co_nm ,count(1) from wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd,comn.cm_co cc where qvqd.vndr_id =cc.co_id group by vndr_id,cc.co_nm order by 2 desc
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
검사결과가 합격이 아닌 데이터를 출력해줘, 출력데이터는 회사명,LOT ID,생산계획번호,품번,품명 이야
select cc.co_nm,lot_id,production_order_id,product_id,product_name from wic.qm_vndr_qlty_data qvqd,comn.cm_co cc where qvqd.result_value != '합격' and qvqd.vndr_id =cc.co_id
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
필드클레임 발생건수를 발생일자기준 월별로 알려줘
select to_char(dfct_ocrn_dtm,'yyyy-mm'),count(1) from wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa group by to_char(dfct_ocrn_dtm,'yyyy-mm') order by 1;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
세화씨엔씨의 2024년 필드클레임 발생건수를 알려줘
select COUNT(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
세화씨엔씨의 2024년 발생한 필드클레임중에 불량유형이 작동불량인 대상을 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.dfct_ty_nm ='작동불량'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 동서콘트롤의 필드클레임 발생내역중에 주관사 담당자가 노상현 수석인 대상을 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서콘트롤%' OR cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서컨트롤%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and qfa.pic_nm like '%노상현%'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 동서콘트롤의 필드클레임 발생내역중에 귀책유형이 기타인 대상을 추출해줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서콘트롤%' OR cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서컨트롤%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and repro_ty_nm like '%기타%'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 리뷰결과가 귀책인정이 아닌 대상을 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.prts_dfct_rvw_rslt_ty_nm !='귀책인정'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 리뷰결과가 귀책인정인 대상의 건수를 알려줘

select count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and qfa.prts_dfct_rvw_rslt_ty_nm ='귀책인정'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 리뷰결과가 귀책제외 인 대상중에 제외 사유가 기타가 아닌 대상을 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.prts_dfct_rvw_rslt_ty_nm ='귀책인정' and qfa.repro_excel_rsn_ty_nm != '기타'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임의 품번 별 발생건수를 알려줘

select qfa.pdt_model_no ,qfa.pdt_model_nm,count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 group by qfa.pdt_model_no ,qfa.pdt_model_nm
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨의 필드클레임의 품번 별 발생건수를 알려줘

select qfa.pdt_model_no ,qfa.pdt_model_nm,count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 group by qfa.pdt_model_no ,qfa.pdt_model_nm
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨의 필드클레임중에 기종이 2톤인 대상만 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_vtyp_nm like '%2톤%';
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 대형인 대상만 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_vtyp_nm like '%대형%';
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 리치트럭인 대상만 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_vtyp_nm like '%리치%'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 7톤인 대상만 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_vtyp_nm like '%7톤%'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 판매모델명이 BR20SP-7P인 대상 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_model_no ='BR20SP-7P'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 판매제품호기가 FRA0K-000782인 대상 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.pdt_ser_no ='FRA0K-000782'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 신성정밀의 필드클레임중에 불량부품번호가 420105-04733 인 대상 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%신성정밀%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2024 and qfa.dfct_parts_no ='420105-04733'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 불량현상이 발판에 관련된게 있다면 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('발판' in qfa.oper_dfct_phnm_cn) >0
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 Outline이 발판에 관련된게 있다면 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('발판' in qfa.oper_dfct_phnm_cn) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 불량조치유형이 프레임에 관련된 건이있다면 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('FRAME' in qfa.oper_dfct_ty_nm) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 Failure Area이 프레임에 관련된 건이있다면 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('FRAME' in qfa.oper_dfct_ty_nm) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 불량원인에 대한 확인내용에 교환 건이있다면 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('교환' in qfa.oper_dfct_cuz_cn) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 Cause가 교환 건이있다면 알려줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and position ('교환' in qfa.oper_dfct_cuz_cn) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 불량조치결과가 공란인 건이있다면 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and (trim(qfa.oper_dfct_rslt_cn) ='' or qfa.oper_dfct_rslt_cn is null);
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중에 Result가 공란인 건이있다면 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and (trim(qfa.oper_dfct_rslt_cn) ='' or qfa.oper_dfct_rslt_cn is null);
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임 하자시간 별 건수를 알려줘

select oprg_hr_ty_nm,count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 group by qfa.oprg_hr_ty_nm;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임 중 가동시간 별 건수를 알려줘

select oprg_hr_ty_nm,count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 group by qfa.oprg_hr_ty_nm;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중을 가동시간이 150시간이 넘는 대상을 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and qfa.oprg_hr > 150
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2023년 성주엠아이 필드클레임중을 하자시간이 150시간이 넘는 대상을 찾아줘

select qfa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_fclm_actn qfa where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠.아이%' or cc.co_nm LIKE '%성주엠아이%') and qfa.dfct_prts_pdc_vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from dfct_ocrn_dtm) = 2023 and qfa.oprg_hr > 150
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨의 공정클레임의 월별 발생건수를 알려줘

select TO_CHAR(qpa.ins_dtm,'yyyy-mm'),count(1) from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024 group by TO_CHAR(qpa.ins_dtm,'yyyy-mm') order by 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 불량내용이 램프에 관련된내용이있다면 찾아줘

select qpa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024 and position('램프' in qpa.dfct_dtl_cn) >0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 pp번호가 700005685747인 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and qpa.ppln_no ='700005685747'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 생산계획번호가 700005685747인 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and qpa.ppln_no ='700005685747'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 불량여부가 Y인 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024 and qpa.dfct_yn ='Y'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 재발방지코드가 NWE080 인 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.* from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%') and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024 and qpa.reps_prvm_cd ='NWE080'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 재발방지를 작업표준 재교육로 처리한 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.*
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('작업표준 재교육' in qpa.reps_prvm_cd_nm  )> 0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 불량유형이 설계인 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.*
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('설계' in qpa.repro_ty_nm )> 0
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.

and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and qpa.actn_cd ='NWE010'

select qpa.*
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('부품교환' in qpa.actn_cd_nm )> 0

2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 조치 상세내용에 OHG에 관련된 내용이 있는 대상 찾아줘

select qpa.*
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('OHG' in qpa.actn_dtl_cn )> 0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 세화씨앤씨 공정클레임중 조치 상세내용에 OHG에 관련된 내용을 찾는데, 비가동번호,PP번호,검사일자, 불량상세내용,신고부서,신고자명,조치상세내용,재발방지 상세내용만 출력해줘

select qpa.dwn_oprg_no,qpa.ppln_no,ins_dtm,qpa.dfct_dtl_cn,qpa.rpt_dept_nm,qpa.rpt_usr_nm,qpa.actn_dtl_cn ,qpa.rlps_prvm_dtl_cn 
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%세화씨엔씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화씨앤씨%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화C&C%' or cc.co_nm like '%세화c&c%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('OHG' in qpa.actn_dtl_cn )> 0;
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
비가동번호 NW240903008 인 데이터를 찾아줘

select *from  wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where qpa.dwn_oprg_no ='NW240903008'
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
2024년 공정클레임에 대해 신고부서별로 건수를 알려줘

select repro_dept_nm,count(1) from  wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
group by repro_dept_nm
order by 1
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.
동서컨트롤의 2024년 공정클레임 중에 페달관련된 불량건에 대해서 찾아줘 , 출력데이터는 라인,대표사양,호기번호,pp번호,비가동번호,검사일자,불량여부,불량상세내용,조치상세내용이야

select qpa.asmbl_line_nm ,qpa.pdt_model_nm ,qpa.pdt_ser_no ,qpa.ppln_no ,qpa.dwn_oprg_no ,qpa.ins_dtm ,qpa.dfct_yn ,qpa.dfct_dtl_cn ,qpa.actn_dtl_cn 
from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서콘트롤%' OR cc.co_nm LIKE '%동서컨트롤%')
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id
and extract (year from qpa.ins_dtm) = 2024
and position('페달' in qpa.dfct_dtl_cn) >0
You are a helpful assistant that answers with SQL.

select qpa.pdt_vhcty_nm,count(1)

where (cc.co_nm like '%동양기계공업(주)%' or cc.co_nm like '%동양기계공업%' )
and qpa.vndr_id = cc.cntm_rel_co_id

from comn.cm_co cc , wic.qm_pclm_actn qpa
where (cc.co_nm like '%동양기계공업(주)%' or cc.co_nm like '%동양기계공업%' )
